channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- PowerVM Hypervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- PowerVM Hypervisor

item.title: CVE-2023-25683|2024-08-02T11:25:19.276Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW950.00 through FW950.71, FW1010.00 through FW1010.40, FW1020.00 through FW1020.20, and FW1030.00 through FW1030.11 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information if they gain service access to the HMC. IBM X-Force ID: 247592.

item.title: CVE-2023-46183|2024-02-06T16:05:23.158Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW950.00 through FW950.90, FW1020.00 through FW1020.40, and FW1030.00 through FW1030.30 could allow a system administrator to obtain sensitive partition information. IBM X-Force ID: 269695.
